WorkItem.Description:
I bind a combo box to the fonts currently installed on a user's system by binding ItemsSource to System.Windows.Media.SystemFontFamilies and defining ItemsPanel as:
 
<ComboBox.ItemsPanel>
	<ItemsPanelTemplate>
		<VirtualizingStackPanel />
	</ItemsPanelTemplate>
</ComboBox.ItemsPanel>
 
However, while this works for the normal WPF themes, when I use ExpressionDark (haven't tested the others) this doesn't work, and opening the combo box results in a long wait as WPF renders each font--the combo box also has an item template that previews each font:
 
<ComboBox.ItemTemplate>
	<DataTemplate>
		<TextBlock
			Text="{Binding}"
			FontFamily="{Binding}"
			FontSize="15"
			Height="20" />
	</DataTemplate>
</ComboBox.ItemTemplate>
